structure.unit: ARTICLE XIV. BACKGROUND CHECKS FOR PERSONNEL IN CHILD CARE AND CERTAIN OTHER FACILITIES

text.section:
Sec. 8A-283. Two-year effective period of investigation.
The applicant shall have his or her application report renewed and a new background investigation performed every two (2) years from the date of the initial report by applying to the Miami-Dade Police Department. The background investigation report may be updated from time to time at the option of the Miami-Dade Police Department. An updated investigation report may be distributed in accordance with the provisions of this article.
